DOC.brief_summary: The study will assess a novel active drug vs. placebo on ability to reduce smoking and aid cessation during a one-week "practice" quit period for each condition in smokers with a high interest in quitting (i.e. crossover design). Medication effects on reducing craving, withdrawal, and cognitive impairment will help assess the mechanism to support quit smoking attempts.
DOC.brief_title: Test of Novel Drug for Smoking Cessation
